title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately causes changes.
OB: When a working set is removed, changes are immediately made.
EB: When a working set is removed, changes should not be immediately made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it so that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
